alert.note: Alert for Eastern Mogollon Rim; Northern Gila County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 10 at 10:33AM MST until December 12 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE SUNDAY NIGHT THROUGH MONDAY EVENING ABOVE 5000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible above 5000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches possible, with values closer to 12 inches along the higher terrain of the Mogollon Rim. Winds could gust as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Areas above 5000 feet near Forest Lakes, Heber- Overgaard, Payson and Pine-Strawberry. * WHEN...From late Sunday night through Monday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Snow forecast from 11 PM Sunday to 11 PM Monday: Forest Lakes 8 to 12 inches Heber-Overgaard 4 to 6 inches Payson 4 to 6 inches Pine-Strawberry 7 to 11 inches
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Mogollon Rim; Northern Gila County
